course_name: Information Processing and Technology / Information Technology Systems: Specia
description: This course is designed to prepare preservice teachers to teach computing subjects in the junior and senior secondary school. It includes theory and practice of teaching information-processing in context of computing technology, curriculum development in areas such as computing, control, data management, retrieval, networks, languages and technology, school-based assessment.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
